amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Federal Railroad Administration Safety and Operations account by $70,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Federal Railroad Administration Safety and Operations by $70,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Kucinich.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
